Ward–Discard a creature card.
[i]Wildfire[/i] – Whenever Berkut, Duma's Spear attacks, create a tapped and attacking X/X red Spirit creature token, where X is Berkut's power.
[i]Kiemhild[/i] – Whenever Berkut becomes blocked, you may pay {3}. If you do, creatures you control deal damage equal to their total power to the defending player.
